title: Two Sum
description: Given an array of integers `nums` and an integer `target`, print the indices of the two numbers such that they add up to `target`. Output indices in ascending order (space separated).

starterCode.python:
# Read inputs from standard input
# Line 1: Array elements space separated
# Line 2: Target integer
nums = list(map(int, input().split()))
target = int(input())

title: Find Maximum
description: Read a line of space-separated integers. Print the maximum element.

starterCode.python:
# Read inputs
nums = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Your code here
print(max(nums))
